name: Le Runner Dood
description:
Le Runner Dood, a fun simple casual arcade game, for everyone.

A whirling sand tornado is chasing you, and if that wasn't enough, you have strange obstacles incoming your way, such as boxes, tires, flying cows and UFO's.

AND you need to DODGE !!

controls are simple: touch and swipe for jump flips, somersaults and slide moves.

I've had tons of fun making this game, and I hope everyone else has the same fun playing it.

The game is free and published on google play store, and I've added the official link here as well.
